key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on Hawaii’s tourism and real estate sectors
Cybersecurity threats and recent data breaches
Regulatory and compliance risks from stringent oversight
Customer service issues impacting reputation and retention
Increasing competition from national banks, credit unions, and fintech companies
controversies: Data breach involving a third-party vendor in late 2023
Customer complaints related to account closures, NSF fees, and system outages
environmental_issues: Sustainability initiatives and green financing efforts
social_issues: Customer service complaints and mixed customer feedback
Expansion of wealth management and commercial banking services
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance costs and potential changes in banking regulations
Recent leadership changes to focus on digital innovation and customer service
